explains: n. 现场解说员，实况播音员；评论员

sentences.en: He achieved celebrity as a sports commentator.
sentences.cn: 他作为一名体育评论员而享誉四方。

sentences.en: "Today's young people are quite calculating," says Chieko Akiyama, a social commentator.
sentences.cn: 社会评论员秋山千子说：“当今的年轻人非常精于算计。”

sentences.en: As that great commentator on human affairs, Dr. Samuel Johnson, once remarked, "Men have been wise in very different modes; but they have always laughed in the same way."
sentences.cn: 正如人类事务的伟大评论家塞缪尔·约翰逊博士曾经说过的那样：“人的明智方式各不相同；但他们笑起来总是一样的。”
